name: LEEN
description:
LEEN is a Turn-based Multiplayer game, where you have to calculate your move to fight with your friend.

Your character is simple, it's tiny paper with a pin as a head.
Map in this game will auto generated and items will be randomly placed.

Every turn player will receive energy to walk and at the end of the turn, If your head points at another player your character will attack them.

The last standing is the winner.
